executiveSummary.vision: Democratize institutional-grade algorithmic trading by making sophisticated AI-powered trading strategies accessible, personalized, and transparent for retail investors with $10K-$500K capital.
executiveSummary.problemStatement: Retail investors lack access to sophisticated trading algorithms that adapt to their specific capital constraints, risk tolerance, and time horizons. Current solutions are either too basic (simple alerts) or too complex (institutional platforms requiring significant technical expertise).
executiveSummary.solutionOverview: An AI-powered personal trading bot that analyzes user capital, recommends optimal strategies, and executes trades across small-cap and mid-cap stocks with flexible time horizons from weeks to months.
executiveSummary.businessImpact: Capture $280M addressable market opportunity in AI trading automation, targeting 125K users and $284M revenue by year 5.

epic1_onboarding.story: As a new user, I want to easily set up my trading bot by specifying my capital amount, so that I receive personalized strategy recommendations.
acceptanceCriteria: User can input capital amount from $10K to $1M
System validates capital amount and provides appropriate strategy options

epic1_onboarding.story: As a user, I want to specify my risk tolerance and trading time horizon, so that the AI can customize strategies to my preferences.
acceptanceCriteria: Risk tolerance scale from 1-10 with clear descriptions
Time horizon options: 1 week, 2 weeks, 1 month, 3 months, 6 months
System explains how each choice affects strategy selection

epic2_strategy_engine.story: As a user, I want the AI to recommend optimal allocation between small-cap and mid-cap stocks based on my capital and goals.
acceptanceCriteria: Algorithm considers capital amount, risk tolerance, and time horizon
Provides clear reasoning for allocation percentages
Updates allocation recommendations based on market conditions

epic2_strategy_engine.story: As a user, I want to see backtested performance of recommended strategies before committing capital.
acceptanceCriteria: Historical performance over multiple market conditions
Risk metrics including max drawdown, Sharpe ratio, volatility
Comparison to benchmark indices (SPY, IWM, etc.)

epic3_execution.story: As a user, I want the bot to execute trades automatically while respecting my risk limits.
acceptanceCriteria: Automatic trade execution based on AI signals
Real-time risk monitoring and position sizing

epic4_monitoring.story: As a user, I want a comprehensive dashboard showing my portfolio performance, active trades, and AI insights.
